item.title: 【Music Videos】PACK - The Cranberries - 24 music videos pack
item.description:
I downloaded the videos of Wake Me When It's Over & All Over Now from YouTube. The rest are from a pack posted on RuTracker and they were processed by me with Avisynth: properly deinterlaced (QTGMC Preset Slow + SRestore to get the original 25 fps from 29.97 interlaced source), slightly denoised with TTempSmooth, resized to the proper aspect ratio using Spline36Resize, cropped the black bars, kept the original stereo track. Finally, the videos were saved as MP4 AVC with CRF 18 Preset Slower setting using FFmpeg. The videos look very good for being SD.

Content:
All Over Now
Analyse
Analyse (Alternative Version)
Animal Instinct
Dreams
Dreams (Alternative Version)
Free to Decide
Just My Imagination
Linger
Ode to My Family
Promises
Ridiculous Thoughts
Ridiculous Thoughts (Alternative Version)
Salvation
Stars
This Is The Day
Time Is Ticking Out
Tomorrow
Wake Me When It's Over
When You're Gone
When You're Gone (Alternative Version)
You & Me
Zombie
Zombie (Alternative Version)

item.author: caladan
